author: sascharodekamp
msg: Optimize Promo code generation. Promo Codes which llok like: GT4eI1a are bad to enter for a customer, furthermore there are some literals which could esaylie mixed up (ie "0" and "O"). So the generation should be a little bit smarter.
So we add three different options to generate a PromoCode:
1.) "clever" only capital letters ans numeric values (no O,0,I,1 ...)
